title: Game Progress Route
content:
f the ambush and let your party handle it. If you support Jaheira and respond to Nine-Fingers by saying 'She's not alone- she has me.', Jaheira will give you her approval. However, Nine-Fingers is very stubborn and will not call off the ambush, so instead, you can look around in the Guildhall to search for leads. This will also update The High Harper quest.

Return to The Surface, Lower City

As soon as you're done with getting intel, you can return to the surface and complete the quest in Water
